event_highlights_audio::clip_card_4::goa: Record the most interesting person involved with the event.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_1::goa: Record people attending the event or reacting to something happening at the event. The more animated your subjects are the better.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_3::goa: Record the most interesting people attending the event.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_7::goa: Look for a climax or dramatic finish to record. It could be the end of a performance or a speech, for example.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_5::goa: Record the most unique part of the event.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_2::goa: Record a sound that sums up what the event is about.
event_highlights_audio::clip_card_6::goa: Record any significant people at the event. For example the main performer or speaker, a dignitary, politician, or celebrity in attendance.
